tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
alladhī khalaqa al-mawta wal-ḥayata liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu ʿamalan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ghafūru
alladhī khalaqa sabʿa samāwātin ṭibāqan mā tarā fī khalqi al-raḥmāni min tafāwutin fa-ir'jiʿi al-baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūrin
thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
walaqad zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bimaṣābīḥa wajaʿalnāhā rujūman lilshayāṭīni wa-aʿtadnā lahum ʿadhāba al-saʿīri
walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim ʿadhābu jahannama wabi'sa al-maṣīru
idhā ul'qū fīhā samiʿū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūru
takādu tamayyazu mina al-ghayẓi kullamā ul'qiya fīhā fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhā alam yatikum nadhīrun
qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
waqālū law kunnā nasmaʿu aw naʿqilu mā kunnā fī aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
fa-iʿ'tarafū bidhanbihim fasuḥ'qan li-aṣḥābi al-saʿīri
inna alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
huwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa dhalūlan fa-im'shū fī manākibihā wakulū min riz'qihi wa-ilayhi al-nushūru
a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
awalam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri fawqahum ṣāffātin wayaqbiḍ'na mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-raḥmānu innahu bikulli shayin baṣīrun
amman hādhā alladhī huwa jundun lakum yanṣurukum min dūni al-raḥmāni ini al-kāfirūna illā fī ghurūrin
amman hādhā alladhī yarzuqukum in amsaka riz'qahu bal lajjū fī ʿutuwwin wanufūrin
afaman yamshī mukibban ʿalā wajhihi ahdā amman yamshī sawiyyan ʿalā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
qul huwa alladhī ansha-akum wajaʿala lakumu al-samʿa wal-abṣāra wal-afidata qalīlan mā tashkurūna
qul huwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-waʿdu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
falammā ra-awhu zul'fatan sīat wujūhu alladhīna kafarū waqīla hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi taddaʿūna
qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya al-lahu waman maʿiya aw raḥimanā faman yujīru al-kāfirīna min ʿadhābin alīmin
qul huwa al-raḥmānu āmannā bihi waʿalayhi tawakkalnā fasataʿlamūna man huwa fī ḍalālin mubīnin
qul ara-aytum in aṣbaḥa māukum ghawran faman yatīkum bimāin maʿīnin
